description: Initialise with climatology (1960-2009 average) in the north Atlantic "sub-polar ocean" (95W-30E, 45N-90N).  Linear transition between climatology and actual observations over a 10 deg buffer zone (35N-45N).  Elsewhere inititialisation is based on observations.
name: NAtlanticClimInitialisation
longName: Initialisation with climatology in the north Atlantic and with observations elsewhere
keywords: North Atlantic, sub-polar gyre, climatology, observation, initialisation
